casebody.data:
WILLIAMS
v.
VONDERAU. No. 18A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 14, 2007. Bruce A. Mason, Wilmington, James F. Rutherford, for Vonderau. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of March 2007 by Plaintiff to Share Oral Argument: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of March 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
